item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:25, so let's meet at 6:55 in the ticket lobby.

I have a little coupon for Fridays, so let's head there after the movie to eat and drink and chat.

Hope to see you Monday for Chronicles of Narnia 3!

-Dana
508/308-4897

---------------------------

OLD STUFF:
The third Narnia movie continues the adventures of 2 of the kids we've seen become royalty, then return to their world and get picked on, then help Narnia fight for its independence (and become royalty again). What does the Dawn Treader have in store? Let's find out together!

SUMMARY:
Edmund and Lucy Pevensie, along with their cousin Eustace, are swallowed into a painting and transported back to Narnia and the magnificent ship The Dawn Treader. They join King Caspian and a warrior mouse named Reepicheep for a mission which holds the fate of Narnia itself. The courageous voyagers overcome their own greatest temptations, as they travel to mysterious islands; have fateful confrontations with magical creatures and sinister enemies; and reunite with their friend and protector, the "Great Lion."

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Narnia: Dawn Treader!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
